statements: SELECT user_id, ar_content_id, preference_score FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preference_score, ar_content_id FROM user_preferences;
SELECT ar_content_id, user_id, preference_score FROM user_preferences;
SELECT ar_content_id, preference_score, user_id FROM user_preferences;
SELECT preference_score, ar_content_id, user_id FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, ar_content_id FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, ar_content_id, preference_score FROM user_preferences ORDER BY preference_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, ar_content_id, preference_score FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8;
SELECT MAX(preference_score) AS max_preference_score, MIN(preference_score) AS min_preference_score FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preference_rating FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_title, content_category FROM learning_content WHERE content_type = 'video';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences ORDER BY preference_rating DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT content_type FROM learning_content;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM learning_content WHERE content_id = 5;
SELECT content_title, content_category FROM learning_content WHERE content_category = 'Science';
SELECT user_id, content_id, preference_rating FROM user_preferences WHERE content_id = 3 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(preference_rating) AS total_rating FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_rating > 10;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, preferred_topic FROM UserPreferences WHERE preferred_difficulty > 3;
SELECT user_id, preferred_topic, preferred_difficulty FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT u.user_id, u.preferred_topic, h.content_id, h.action_taken FROM UserPreferences u INNER JOIN UserHistory h ON u.user_id = h.user_id;
SELECT c.content_id, c.topic, c.difficulty_level, u.user_id FROM ContentMeta c LEFT JOIN UserHistory u ON c.content_id = u.content_id;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE preferred_topic = 'Science' AND preferred_difficulty = 3;
SELECT user_id, preferred_topic FROM UserPreferences WHERE preferred_difficulty > 2;
SELECT user_id, content_id FROM UserHistory WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND action_taken = 'viewed';
SELECT * FROM ContentMeta WHERE topic = 'Math' AND difficulty_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT UserPreferences.user_id, ContentMeta.topic FROM UserPreferences JOIN ContentMeta ON UserPreferences.preferred_topic = ContentMeta.topic;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM LearningContent WHERE content_type = 'Video';
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_id, completed FROM UserLearningHistory WHERE completed = true;
SELECT content_title AS Title, content_type AS Type FROM LearningContent ORDER BY content_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, preference_1 FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM LearningContent WHERE content_type = 'Video';
SELECT user_id, content_title, completed FROM UserLearningHistory WHERE completed = true;
SELECT user_id, content_title, preference_1 FROM UserPreferences p JOIN LearningContent c ON p.user_id = c.content_id;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, category, preference_score FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT category_name, topic_name FROM Categories, Topics WHERE Categories.category_id = Topics.topic_id;

SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, category_name, topic_name FROM Recommendations, Categories, Topics WHERE Recommendations.category_id = Categories.category_id AND Recommendations.topic_id = Topics.topic_id;
SELECT user_id, device_type FROM UserDevices ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE category = 'Tech' AND preference_score > 50;
SELECT user_id, category, preference_score FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY preference_score DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM UserPreferences JOIN Categories ON UserPreferences.category = Categories.category_name GROUP BY category_name;

SELECT UserDevices.user_id, device_type, category_name FROM UserDevices JOIN UserPreferences ON UserDevices.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id JOIN Categories ON UserPreferences.category = Categories.category_name;

SELECT Recommendations.recommendation_id, user_id, category_name, topic_name FROM Recommendations JOIN Categories ON Recommendations.category_id = Categories.category_id JOIN Topics ON Recommendations.topic_id = Topics.topic_id WHERE user_id = 200;
